name: RESCOLL
goal: RESCOLL is an innovative SME, best defined as a research company for materials, specialized in composites and polymers. RESCOLL’s activities are industrial research and development of innovative products and processes. RESCOLL is conducting innovation research in the field of industrial applications of polymers (composites, resins, adhesives, varnish, coatings, etc.) and related fields: bonded assemblies, materials fire behavior and environmentally friendly surface treatments.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Environment (DEEE, ROHS)
Chemistry (REACH, CLP)
Aeronautics
Space
Medical devices
Automotive (ELV, electric and hybrid cars, safety)
Rail
